devdoc.details: A simplified bridge contract for bridging ETH from Ethereum L1 to Arbitrum L2

params.arbitrumRecipient: The recipient address on Arbitrum (as string)

processBridgeTransaction(uint256).details: Process a bridge transaction (owner only - simulates L2 processing)

params._newFee: The new bridge fee in wei

devdoc.title: ArbitrumBridge

bridgeToArbitrum(string).notice: Sends ETH to be bridged to Arbitrum L2

userdoc.notice: This is a demonstration contract for testnet use
